snippet.title: Q&A AND EARLY TEASERS | Around the Clock at Bikini Bottom (Dave Microwaves Games)
snippet.description:
Here ya'll go, the reupload for the Around the Clock at Bikini Bottom Q&A and early teasers! In today's update video, we'll be touching upon common questions asked by the community, reveal the Jellien enemies, and give a rough release date.

Around the Clock should come out in November, probably in time for Steven Hillenburg's one-year anniversary in regards to his passing; while it stinks that we're kinda stuck making this game for a majority of the year, we're putting our heart and soul into making this passion project something to jot down in the history books for SpongeBob SquarePants fans. We hope you stick around until then, especially if you've played Dave's other games like, "3AM at the Krusty Krab," or, "3:30AM at Floater's Cemetery!"

Additionally, feel free to refer to me as Snowmizzle Studio when referring to my involvement with the game; it's a branding thang, hahah.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you'd like to stay up-to-date with Around the Clock, feel free to also visit Dave's channel:

Dave Microwaves Games ► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEr8Emk3781_Inm-V1q2yPQ

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Did you enjoy the video? Why not throw a snowball at the like button and share the video to grow our lil' community!

Additionally, you can comment to provide feedback, spark a conversation, or recommend a game for me to try.

You can go the extra mile and...

Subscribe today! ► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHgYdpLEy59XKbiruPSHA6
Follow me on Twitter! ► https://twitter.com/PadreSnowmizzle
Check out my Steam Curation page! ► https://store.steampowered.com/curator/32199049-Padre%2527s-PROCON-Scalers/

I hope ya'll are having a chill day so far!

#aroundtheclockatbikinibottom #aroundtheclock #davemicrowavesgames
